description: Schema definition for Workflow Integrity Telemetry System (WITS). Mandated structure for GCO state logging.

fieldDefinitions.gsep_stage: Integer 0-6 indicating current stage of GSEP.
fieldDefinitions.arbitration_result: Conditional structure capturing EPDP output (A, B, or C) if applicable. Must lock S-01, S-02, S-03 at EPDP C.
